Package com.microsoft.windowsazure.serviceruntime

This package contains classes and interfaces that allow your roles to interact with the Windows Azure environment.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RoleEnvironmentChangedListener
    Represents the listener for the environment changed event.
    RoleEnvironmentChangingListener
    Represents the listener for the environment changing event.
    RoleEnvironmentStoppingListener
    Represents the listener for the stopping event.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CurrentState  
    LocalResource
    Represents a local storage resource reserved for a service.
    Role
    Represents a role that is defined as part of a hosted service.
    RoleEnvironment
    Represents the Windows Azure environment in which an instance of a role is running.
    RoleEnvironmentChange
    Abstract class that represents a change to the service's configuration.
    RoleEnvironmentChangedEvent
    Occurs after a change to the service configuration has been applied to the running instances of the role.
    RoleEnvironmentChangingEvent
    Occurs before a change to the service configuration is applied to the running instances of the role.
    RoleEnvironmentConfigurationSettingChange
    Represents a change to a configuration setting.
    RoleEnvironmentTopologyChange
    Represents a change to the topology of the service.
    RoleInfo
    Java class for RoleInfo complex type.
    RoleInstance
    Represents an instance of a role.
    RoleInstanceEndpoint
    Represents an endpoint associated with a role instance.
    RuntimeKernel  
    RuntimeServerDiscoveryInfo
    Java class for RuntimeServerDiscoveryInfo complex type.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    RoleInstanceStatus
    Defines role instance status values, such as Busy and Ready.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    RoleEnvironmentNotAvailableException
    Represents an exception indicating the role environment is not available.

Package com.microsoft.windowsazure.serviceruntime Description

This package contains classes and interfaces that allow your roles to interact with the Windows Azure environment. For example, the RoleEnvironment.requestRecycle() method allows an instance of your role to request to be stopped and then restarted.
